attributes.action: Award the George Cross to UK civilians who have died during the Syrian War
attributes.background:
Luke Rutter - 06/07/2017
Ryan Lock - 21/12/2016
Dean Evans - 21/07/2016
Konstantinos Erik Scurfield - 02/03/2016

These men all gave their lives fighting terror abroad
The least we can do is award them with the recognition each one of them deserves.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour.

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour, including the George Cross, here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
